cs.CC, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with the threshold degree of Boolean functions, which is a topic in computational complexity theory (cs.CC). The paper also discusses the use of perceptron-based techniques for PAC learning, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG). The proof technique involves rational functions and approximation, which are topics in discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and information theory (cs.IT). The paper also mentions direct product theorems, which are a topic in theoretical computer science (cs.DS).
